title: Labour MPs will be powerless to stop a committed Corbyn agreeing a December election
text:
MPs may moan and fear losing their seats, but the days of PLP independence are over

Does Jeremy Corbyn suffer from Parachute Syndrome? Admittedly it’s a non-existent condition that I just made up, but bear with me. As a young trainee reporter, I accepted an offer to do a parachute jump that would be free of charge provided I wrote up the experience for my newspaper. Excited and terrified in equal measure, I went ahead, and survived, despite my misgivings.

As I stumbled around the Fife moor where I’d landed, the adrenalin still coursing through my body, I resolved to repeat the exercise. The longer I waited for my second jump, however, the less attractive the prospect became. Wasn’t I pushing...
description: MPs may moan and fear losing their seats, but the days of PLP independence are over
